content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment in Mannheim. I am interested in renting out this apartment for the highest possible price. What rental price are you willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you tell me if there are any other rooms available?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I apologize, but at this time, there are no other rooms available for rent. This apartment is the only option I have available. However, I am open to negotiating the rental price to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What rental price are you willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I was thinking of 500 Euros per month. Is that possible?

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you tell me if there are any other rooms available?

I apologize, but at this time, there are no other rooms available for rent. This apartment is the only option I have available. However, I am open to negotiating the rental price to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What rental price are you willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand your desire for the lowest possible rental price, but I am afraid that 500 Euros per month may not be feasible for me as a landlord. I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. That being said, I am open to negotiating the rental price to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What rental price are you willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
